title: Solar tent

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a solar tent, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front or right top perspective view of a solar tent showing our new design therefor in a first position and with a ground sheet according to a first embodiment thereof;
FIG. 2 is a view similar to FIG. 1 in a different position;
FIG. 3 is a view similar to FIG. 1 in a still further position;
FIG. 4 is a view similar to FIG. 1 in a still further position;
FIG. 5 is a view similar to FIG. 1 in a still further position;
FIG. 6 is a perspective view of the embodiment of FIG. 1 taken with more of the top of the design visible and in a position similar to that of FIG. 3;
FIG. 7 is a perspective view of the second embodiment of our invention in a first position and with front and rear beams at ground level;
FIG. 8 is a view similar to FIG. 7 in a further position;
FIG. 9 is a view similar to FIG. 7 in a further position;
FIG. 10 is a view similar to FIG. 7 in a further position;
FIG. 11 is a view similar to FIG. 7 in a further position; and,
FIG. 12 is a view similar to FIG. 7 but with more of the top visible and in a position substantially corresponding to that of FIG. 9.
